sentences.sContent: Ideally, your car should have high-security locks.
sentences.sCn: 最理想的情况是，你的车应该配有高度安全的车锁。

sentences.sContent: Fruit and vegetables should ideally be organically grown.
sentences.sCn: 水果和蔬菜最理想的应该是有机种植。
